console.log("âœ… Wrapped WETH:", ethers.formatEther(bal));
const bal = await weth.balanceOf(signer.address);
await tx.wait();
const tx = await weth.deposit({ value: ethers.parseEther("0.1") });
// Wrap 0.1 ETH into WETH
const weth = new ethers.Contract("0x097D90c9d3E0B50Ca60e1ae45F6A81010f9FB534", IWETH_ABI, signer);
const [signer] = await ethers.getSigners();
const IWETH_ABI = ["function deposit() payable", "function balanceOf(address) view returns (uint256)"];
